title: Enables current universal offset
description: Updates your client's universal offset setting.

title: Suggested universal offset text color
description: Updates your suggested offset text color setting.

title: Reset universal offset suggestion
description: Whether to reset the suggested universal offset when client universal offset is changed

title: Enables last map's offset
description: Updates your last map's offset calculation.

title: Real time offset calculation
description: Whether to calculate suggested offset in real time

title: Warning text display time
description: How long (in miliseconds) should warning text be displayed for before fading
